page.title: 07LIFE IN CHERRY WILLINGHAM
page.content: Cherry Willingham is a quiet village on the edge of Lincoln. As a teenager I go to Cherry comprehensive school. Most teenagers find that there is little to do except go to youth club (Monday to Friday), Scouts or Guides, or for girls the Girls Friendly Society and boys the Army Cadets. These are quite well attended but many teenagers don't go to any of these. T.V. must be the only major activity for most of my friends whilst others either go around in groups hanging around the streets or riding their B.M.X.'s. At the weekends we go into Lincoln and either hang around the High St. or go round the shops. If we're not playing football or tennis (in the summer) then Sunday is a dead day apart from T.V. T.Whittingham
